name: Ouroboros, Oubliette
description:
Instructions:

Unzip and run the UI.exe

Notes:

Use the numpad or number keys to select an action.

Unfortunately I didn't have time to add a restart option. The game exits upon completion (win or loss).  Run the application again to start another session.

If any party member's attributes reach "0", they will be knocked out and will be unable to act until that attribute is restored.

If all party members are knocked out, you lose.

Known Bugs: The Ouroboros attacks unconscious characters on occasion.
